mapper.select: select a.reg_seq, a.emg_seq, a.way_typ, a.mpi, a.reg_tim, a.cst_nam, a.cst_age, (select info from dstdictinfo where typecode='CST_AGE_COD' and infocode=a.cst_age_cod) cst_age_cod_inf, a.cst_sex_cod, a.cst_age_cod, a.id_nbr, a.phe_nbr, a.hsp_ara, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'BQPG') bqpg, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'BQPGMX') bqpgmx, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'KILLIP') killip, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'XUEY') xuey, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'XINL') xinl from hsp_dbzl_bas a

select a.emg_seq, a.emg_dat, a.cst_nam, a.cst_age, a.cst_sex_cod, a.xt_sub_cod, a.oxy_nbr, b.sbpup_nbr, b.sbpdown_nbr, b.hrt_rte, a.id_nbr, a.phe_nbr, a.pre_dgn_cod, a.sym_sit_des, (select bed_num from hsp_bed_inf where emg_seq = a.emg_seq) bed_num, (select pro_val from hsp_xtzl_inf where emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'KILLIP') killip, (select ill_tim from aid_patient where patid = a.patid) illTim from hsp_emg_inf a, hsp_mews_inf b where a.emg_seq = b.emg_seq(+) and a.cspg_flg = '1'
and (a.vst_cad = #{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR} or a.cst_nam like '%'||#{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR}||'%' )
and a.emg_dat >= sysdate - 1
order by emg_dat desc

select a.reg_seq, a.reg_tim, a.emg_seq, a.mpi, a.pat_typ, a.way_typ, a.card_type, a.vst_cad, a.cst_nam, a.cst_sex_cod, a.id_type, a.id_nbr, a.cst_age_cod, (select info from dstdictinfo where typecode='CST_AGE_COD' and infocode=a.cst_age_cod) cst_age_cod_inf, a.cst_age, a.pat_wgt, a.pat_hgt, a.bth_dat, a.phe_nbr, a.cst_adr, a.nation, a.emg_job, a.marital_status, a.cst_edu, a.lnk_man, a.lnk_way, a.grn_chl, a.sw_chl, a.hsp_ara, a.yqxh, a.jzxh, a.zyxh, a.doc_dat, a.jzys, a.ysxm, a.ksdm, a.crt_tim, a.crt_no, a.crt_nam, a.mod_tim, a.mod_no, a.mod_nam, a.rcd_sta, a.chk_tim, a.chk_no, a.chk_nam, a.chk_msg, a.stp_flg, a.stp_tim, a.stp_no, a.stp_nam, a.smt_sta, a.smt_seq, a.smt_msg, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'BQPG') bqpg, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'XUEY') xuey, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'XINL') xinl, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'CBZD') cbzd from Hsp_Dbzl_Bas a where a.reg_seq = #{regSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select a.emg_seq, a.reg_tim, a.cst_nam, a.cst_age, a.cst_sex_cod, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'XTZBNH') xtzbnh, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'XUEYANG') xueyang, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'XUEY') xuey, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'XINL') xinl, a.id_nbr, a.phe_nbr, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'CBYX') cbyx, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'BRZSZZ') brzszz, (select bed_num from hsp_bed_inf where emg_seq = a.emg_seq) bed_num, (select pro_val from hsp_xtzl_inf where emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'KILLIP') killip, (select pro_val FROM hsp_xtzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'FBSJ') fbsj from HSP_DBZL_BAS a where a.pat_typ = '3'
and (a.vst_cad = #{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR} or a.cst_nam like '%'||#{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR}||'%' )
and a.reg_tim >= sysdate - 1
order by reg_tim desc

select count(*) from hsp_dbzl_bas a where a.pat_typ = '3'
and (a.vst_cad = #{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR} or a.cst_nam like '%'||#{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR}||'%' )
and a.crt_tim >= sysdate - 1
